duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather, understand, and define business requirements from clients and end users.
Implement major projects in Salesforce Communication Cloud, with at least 2 projects completed.
Develop user stories and to-be process flows for the design and development of Salesforce solutions.
Collaborate with team members to design solutions that meet client business requirements and fulfill user stories.
Configure user stories within Salesforce and collaborate with developers to test and verify solutions.
Participate in key meetings with clients, including requirements sessions, system demos, user acceptance testing, and end user training.
Translate user requirements into technical specifications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
